name: Herbed Rice Salad
keywords: chives, long-grain rice, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Put the rice in a saucepan, add the water, bring to a boil, cover and cook for about 15 minutes, until the water is absorbed. Set aside, covered, for five minutes longer. Remove cover and allow rice to cool about 30 minutes until barely warm, fluffing it occasionally with a fork.
When the rice has cooled, transfer it to a bowl and lightly mix in the remaining ingredients. Set aside at room temperature till serving.
